CustomBehavior.Text: You meet the level requirement to run this profile.
We are in UBRS or near the entrance to UBRS, avoiding the burning brazier as we exit.
Our weapon has been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Our weapon has not been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Waiting 3 seconds - Bag and durability check.
Our weapon has been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Our weapon has not been Runeforged with Rune of Spellshattering.
Distance from portal is not within our proximity, initializing movement to get there.
Waiting for the dungeon to load.
We are locked out. Waiting and trying again.
Deleting unwanted items from our bags.
We are currently between levels 62-65. Default Blood DK's using Singular as the combat routine should be averaging about 70K XP/hr @ level 62,
We are currently between levels 62-66. Default Blood DK's using Singular as the combat routine should be averaging about 70K XP/hr @ level 62,
Waiting 3 seconds - Bag and durability check.
We don't have friendly or greater reputation with our guild. Aborting Mobile Banking procedures!
We have more than 25 empty bag slots. Our gear is above 30% durability and we have Homemade Cherry Pie.
